---
title: ""
listing:
  id: guide-listing
  contents: blocks
  sort: "date desc"
  type: grid
  categories: cloud 
  feed: true
  sort-ui: true
  filter-ui: true
  image-placeholder: images/coffee.png
format:
  html:
    css: styles/listing_styles.css
    backgroundcolor: "#030616"
    page-layout: custom
    toc: false
    include-in-header: 
        - html_chunks/style_load.html
    include-before-body:
        # 1. HERO SECTION (Map + Title + Subtitle)
        # We put this all in one text block to prevent broken tags.
        - text: |
            <div class="h-[55vh] relative w-full z-0 bg-slate-950">
                <div id="map" class="h-full w-full z-0 bg-slate-950"></div> 
                
                <div class="absolute top-8 left-8 z-[50] pointer-events-none">
                    
                    <h1 class="font-sans text-3xl md:text-5xl font-bold text-white tracking-tighter drop-shadow-lg m-0 p-0 leading-tight">
                    HEADER NAME
                    </h1>
                    
                    <div class="mt-2 flex items-center gap-2">
                        <span class="relative !flex !flex-none !w-2 !h-2 !relative items-center justify-center">
                            <span style="animation: force-fade-ping 3s cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.2, 1) infinite;" class="!absolute !inline-flex !h-full !w-full rounded-full bg-cyan-400"></span>
                            <span class="!relative !inline-flex rounded-full !h-1.5 !w-1.5 bg-cyan-500"></span>
                        </span>
                        
                        <p class="font-mono text-xs text-cyan-400 tracking-widest uppercase m-0 leading-none">
                        SUBTITLE NAME
                        </p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <style>
                @keyframes force-fade-ping {
                    0% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 0.75; }
                    75%, 100% { transform: scale(2); opacity: 0; }
                }
            </style>

        # 2. MENU OVERLAY (Keep this separate as it is self-contained)
        - html_chunks/menu/menu.html

    include-after-body:
        - html_chunks/menu/menu_script.html
---
